meanings.definition: A marriage ceremony, especially considered as including the associated celebrations.
meanings.sent1: Many people attend weddings to celebrate love and commitment.
meanings.sent2: My sister's wedding was a beautiful celebration with flowers and music.
meanings.sent3: At the wedding, the cake was so big it could feed an army!
meanings.sent4: The wedding was a colorful tapestry of joy and unity.
meanings.sent5: The wedding bells rang out, filling the air with happiness.

meanings.sent1: Their weddings marked the beginning of a new chapter in their lives.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, weddings involve traditional rituals and customs.
meanings.sent3: The weddings of the mice in the story were quite comical.
meanings.sent4: Their love was like a wedding of two rivers, flowing together as one.
meanings.sent5: The weddings in the village were always grand affairs, full of laughter and dancing.
